articles.content:
New Ministries to Appear in DPRK 
    Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly on setting up the Ministry of Metal Industry and the Ministry of Machine-Building Industry of the DPRK was promulgated on May 30.
 According to the decree, the Ministry of Metal and Machine-Building Industries will cease to exist and the above-said ministries will be established.

Gift to Kim Jong Il from Angolan Armed Forces 
    Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was presented with a gift by the Angolan Armed Forces.
 The gift was handed Tuesday by General Agostino Fernandes Nelumba, chief of the General Staff of the Angolan Armed Forces, on a visit to the DPRK to Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, member of the DPRK National Defence Commission and chief of the General Staff of the KPA.

articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets German Ambassador
    Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with Doris Hertrampf, German ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present there were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and staff members of the German embassy here.

articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Chinese Visiting Group
    Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, had a friendly conversation with the visiting group of Chinese eye specialists led by Ren Yuanchu, chairman of the Shanghai Ophthalmology Association, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
 At the conversation, the head of the group noted that the exchange and cooperation were brisk in the field of ophthalmology between China and the DPRK and expressed the belief that such relations would further develop thanks to the joint efforts of the specialists of the two countries.

articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from CPBM Delegation
    Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of the Communist Party of Bohemia and Moravia (CPBM) on a visit to the DPRK.
 The gift was conveyed to Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Miroslav Grevenicek, chairman of the CPBM Central Committee, who is leading the delegation on Wednesday.
